title: thagadurA rAmachandrA
sahitya:
tagadurA rAmacandra nanniTu yagaTu beTTiyalayimpa jEyuTa

anupallavi

 jagadIsha vara nIdu bhaktula nishamu digulu baDucu dInulaiyuNDuTa

caraNam 1

 vEda shAstra marmamula neringina vibudhavarulu nI mahima delupavini 
mOda mandi ninnu dalaci mrokkina nAdu bhAvamerigi brOva kuNDuTa
 
caraNam 2

 daivamanucu cAla ninnu madilO drDhamugAnu nammi eTulaina nanu 
kAvu kAvumanucu entO moraliDa karuga dayagAda nIdu hrdayamu
 
caraNam 3

 Emi sEtu nevaritO telupudunu nA manOrathamula dIrpa jAlavu 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata hrdAbja madhukara
